scripts.check: npm run lint -s && dependency-check package.json --entry index.js
scripts.marktoc:
npx replace -s -q '### Changelog' '<!-- START doctoc -->\
<!-- END doctoc -->' CHANGELOG.md
scripts.syms: node --harmony --no-warnings -r esm index.js parse node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es6.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/node.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/dom.es6.generated.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/esnext.promise.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/inspector.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es2017.intl.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es2017.object.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es2017.sharedmemory.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es2017.string.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es2017.typedarrays.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.esnext.asynciterable.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/webworker.generated.d.ts >sym.json
scripts.es6: node --harmony --no-warnings -r esm index.js parse node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.es6.d.ts node_modules/typescript/lib/node.d.ts >es6-node.json
